name: Bushi
description:
This is a prototype.

Yeeted sprites from Hakuoki and bg from the interwebs.

Heavily influenced by Vagabond, Dororo, Kenshin etc. Basically, I like samurai.

Been learning Ren'Py for a few months, and I think this is going pretty well.

I have no experience in coding so ¯\_(ツ)_/¯
